sources.title: Girl In The Kremlin (1957)
sources.description: The Girl in the Kremlin Lex Barker, Zsa Zsa Gabor, Maurice Manson 1957 Directed by Russell Birdwell

sources.title: The Girl In The Kremlin (1957)
sources.description: Russell Birdwell, Lex Barker, Zsa Zsa Gabor

metadata.Plot: In Moscow 1953, four terrified women prisoners are brought before Joseph Stalin, who chooses the beautiful Dasha. He punishes her by shaving off her long hair. Moments later, a plastic surgeon leads Stalin into the operating room and transforms his face so that he is unrecognizable.
metadata.Writer: Gene L. Coon, Robert Hill, Harry Ruskin
metadata.Actors: Lex Barker, Zsa Zsa Gabor, Jeffrey Stone
